summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jes Staley and Paul W. Waring discussing a newsletter. The email includes a forwarded message from Waring to himself, indicating a casual communication about news updates.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, forwarding a message regarding news updates.

persons.name: Paul W. Waring
persons.context: Paul W. Waring is the sender of the original message discussing the latest news.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 20, 2009.
Jes Staley forwarded a message from Paul W. Waring.
The subject of the email was about a newsletter titled 'This month's news'.
Paul W. Waring's email includes a casual tone, referring to the newsletter as 'the latest rag'.
The document contains a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
